verses.verse: The <S%H2377>vision<s%> of <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz,<s%> which he <S%H2372>saw<s%> concerning <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah,<s%> <S%H3147>Jotham,<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz,<s%> and <S%H3169>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and <S%H238>listen,<s%> <S%H776>earth;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken:<s%> "I have <S%H1431>nourished<s%> and brought <S%H7311>up<s%> <S%H1121>children,<s%> and they have rebelled against <S%H6586>me.<s%>

The <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> his <S%H7069>owner,<s%> and the <S%H2543>donkey<s%> his <S%H1167>master<s%>'s <S%H18>crib;<s%> but <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3045>doesn't<s%> know, my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H995>don't<s%> consider."

<S%H1945>Ah<s%> <S%H2398>sinful<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3515>loaded<s%> with <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> a <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers,<s%> <S%H2233>children<s%> who deal <S%H7843>corruptly!<s%> They have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> They have <S%H5006>despised<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> They are <S%H2114>estranged<s%> and <S%H268>backward.<s%>

Why should you be <S%H5221>beaten<s%> <S%H5627>more,<s%> that you revolt more and <S%H3254>more?<s%> The whole <S%H7218>head<s%> is <S%H2483>sick,<s%> and the whole <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H1742>faint.<s%>

From the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of the <S%H7272>foot<s%> even to the <S%H7218>head<s%> there is no <S%H4974>soundness<s%> in <S%H6482>it:<s%> wounds, <S%H2250>welts,<s%> and <S%H2961>open<s%> <S%H4347>sores.<s%> They <S%H2115>haven't<s%> been closed, neither <S%H2280>bandaged,<s%> neither <S%H7401>soothed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

Your <S%H776>country<s%> is <S%H8077>desolate.<s%> Your <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%> <S%H2114>Strangers<s%> <S%H398>devour<s%> your <S%H127>land<s%> in your <S%H8077>presence,<s%> and it is desolate, as <S%H4114>overthrown<s%> by <S%H2114>strangers.<s%>

The <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> is <S%H3498>left<s%> like a <S%H5521>shelter<s%> in a <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> like a <S%H4412>hut<s%> in a field of <S%H4750>melons,<s%> like a <S%H5341>besieged<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%>

<S%H3884>Unless<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> had <S%H3498>left<s%> to us a very <S%H4592>small<s%> <S%H8300>remnant,<s%> we would have <S%H1961>been<s%> as <S%H5467>Sodom;<s%> we would have been <S%H1819>like<s%> <S%H6017>Gomorrah.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you <S%H7101>rulers<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom!<s%> <S%H238>Listen<s%> to the <S%H8451>law<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> you <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah!<s%>

<S%H4100>"What<s%> are the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> to <S%H559>me?<s%>," says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> "I have had <S%H7646>enough<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> of <S%H352>rams,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of fed <S%H4806>animals.<s%> I <S%H2654>don't<s%> delight in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> or of <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> or of male <S%H6260>goats.<s%>
When you <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1245>me,<s%> who has required this at your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> to <S%H7429>trample<s%> my <S%H2691>courts?<s%>

<S%H935>Bring<s%> no <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H7723>vain<s%> <S%H4503>offerings.<s%> <S%H7004>Incense<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H2320>me;<s%> new moons, <S%H7676>Sabbaths,<s%> and <S%H4744>convocations:<s%> I <S%H3201>can't<s%> bear <S%H3201>with<s%> <S%H205>evil<s%> <S%H4744>assemblies.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H8130>hates<s%> your New <S%H2320>Moons<s%> and your appointed <S%H4150>feasts.<s%> They are a <S%H2960>burden<s%> to <S%H3811>me.<s%> I am weary of bearing <S%H5375>them.<s%>

When you spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> your <S%H3709>hands,<s%> I will <S%H5956>hide<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H7235>you.<s%> Yes, when you make many <S%H8605>prayers,<s%> I will not <S%H8085>hear.<s%> Your <S%H3027>hands<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

<S%H7364>Wash<s%> <S%H2135>yourselves,<s%> make yourself clean. Put <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings<s%> from <S%H5048>before<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes.<s%> <S%H2308>Cease<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil.<s%>

<S%H3925>Learn<s%> to do <S%H3190>well.<s%> <S%H1875>Seek<s%> <S%H4941>justice.<s%> <S%H833>Relieve<s%> the <S%H2541>oppressed.<s%> <S%H8199>Judge<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless.<s%> <S%H7378>Plead<s%> for the <S%H490>widow.<s%>"

"Come <S%H3212>now,<s%> and let us reason <S%H3198>together,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> "Though your <S%H2399>sins<s%> be as <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> they shall be as <S%H3835>white<s%> as <S%H7950>snow.<s%> Though they be <S%H119>red<s%> like <S%H8438>crimson,<s%> they shall be as <S%H6785>wool.<s%>
If you are <S%H14>willing<s%> and <S%H8085>obedient,<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2898>good<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%>
but if you <S%H3985>refuse<s%> and <S%H4784>rebel,<s%> you shall be <S%H398>devoured<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> for the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has spoken <S%H1696>it.<s%>"

How the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H7151>city<s%> has become a <S%H2181>prostitute!<s%> She was <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H4941>justice;<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> <S%H3885>lodged<s%> in <S%H7523>her,<s%> but now murderers.
Your <S%H3701>silver<s%> has become <S%H5509>dross,<s%> your <S%H5435>wine<s%> <S%H4107>mixed<s%> with <S%H4325>water.<s%>

Your <S%H8269>princes<s%> are <S%H5637>rebellious,<s%> and <S%H2270>companions<s%> of <S%H1590>thieves.<s%> Everyone <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H7810>bribes,<s%> and <S%H7291>follows<s%> after <S%H8021>rewards.<s%> They <S%H8199>don't<s%> judge the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> neither does the <S%H7379>cause<s%> of the <S%H490>widow<s%> come to <S%H935>them.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H113>Lord,<s%> <S%H113>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the Mighty <S%H46>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5002>says:<s%> <S%H1945>"Ah,<s%> I will get <S%H5162>relief<s%> from my <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> and <S%H5358>avenge<s%> myself of my <S%H341>enemies;<s%>
and I will <S%H7725>turn<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on <S%H1253>you,<s%> thoroughly purge <S%H6884>away<s%> your <S%H5509>dross,<s%> and will take <S%H5493>away<s%> all your <S%H913>tin.<s%>

I will <S%H7725>restore<s%> your <S%H8199>judges<s%> as at the <S%H7223>first,<s%> and your <S%H3289>counselors<s%> as at the <S%H8462>beginning.<s%> <S%H310>Afterward<s%> you shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5892><s%> 'The city of <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> a <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H7151>town.<s%>'
<S%H6726>Zion<s%> shall be <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> with <S%H4941>justice,<s%> and her <S%H7725>converts<s%> with <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

But the <S%H7667>destruction<s%> of <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> and <S%H2400>sinners<s%> shall be <S%H3162>together,<s%> and those who <S%H5800>forsake<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall be <S%H3615>consumed.<s%>

For they shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of the <S%H352>oaks<s%> which you have <S%H2530>desired,<s%> and you shall be <S%H2659>confounded<s%> for the <S%H1593>gardens<s%> that you have <S%H977>chosen.<s%>
For you shall be as an <S%H424>oak<s%> whose <S%H5929>leaf<s%> <S%H5034>fades,<s%> and as a <S%H1593>garden<s%> that has no <S%H4325>water.<s%>

The <S%H2634>strong<s%> will be like <S%H5296>tinder,<s%> and his <S%H6467>work<s%> like a <S%H5213>spark.<s%> They will <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H1197>burn<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> and no one will quench <S%H3518>them.<s%>"
